author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/x13mk (compensated affiliate link) - The Asus Rog Strix G16 I looked at recently was very easy to upgrade, so I popped in a second NVME SSD and took Bazzite out for a spin. It installed easily but did not perform as well on Linux. See the laptop review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j1-fj4eINC4 and more gaming: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsqsyYumCe8N1h3KJFX6JvT and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
